UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile in the application.

username.description: The user's display name, derived from their email.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user account was created.

Draft.title: Legal Draft
Draft.description: A legal document draft generated by a user.

userId.description: The UID of the user who created the draft.

documentType.description: The type of the legal document.

content.description: The full text content of the generated draft.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the draft was created.

template.title: Legal Template
template.description: A template for a legal document.

lawFeed.title: Law Feed
lawFeed.description: An item in the law feed.

glossary.title: Glossary
glossary.description: A legal term and its definition.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profiles, keyed by their Firebase Auth UID.

/users/{userId}/drafts/{draftId}.description: Stores legal drafts created by a specific user.

/templates/{templateId}.description: Stores legal templates with type, inputs, structure, and lastUpdated.

/lawFeed/{updateId}.description: Stores law feed updates with title, summary, link, and timestamp.
